name: treesinging
description: Recipes related to turning sung wood into furniture and items.

name: treesung wooden chair
description:
Use your magick to turn treesung wood into a chair.

You must have <color_yellow>Treesinging level 3</color> and at least <color_yellow>300 mana</color> to create the item.

effect.u_message: As your song fades, you behold a wooden chair all made of a single solid piece of wood, as though it had grown that way in the depths of the forest.

false_effect.u_message: Your attempts to sing the wood fail, ruining it!
You do not have enough mana to treesing the wood properly.
